Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Chicago
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Chicago due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Chicago due to police activity.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
